abstract.p: Correction of Aug 1 article on Discovery Zone; company is controlled by Martin S Davis, not Marvin Davis, and Davis is former chief executive of Paramount Communications, not its Paramount Pictures subsidiary (S)

block.p: The Market Place column in Business Day yesterday about trading in the old stock of the Discovery Zone, misidentified the investor who controls the company and misstated his earlier affiliation. He is Martin S. Davis, not Marvin Davis. Martin Davis is a former chief executive of Paramount Communications, not its Paramount Pictures subsidiary.

The Market Place column in Business Day yesterday about trading in the old stock of the Discovery Zone, misidentified the investor who controls the company and misstated his earlier affiliation. He is Martin S. Davis, not Marvin Davis. Martin Davis is a former chief executive of Paramount Communications, not its Paramount Pictures subsidiary.
